      • input

        public Calculator input​(char c)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Calculator
        A functionality to perform addition, subtraction and multiplication operations between given input numbers.
        Specified by:
        input in interface Calculator
        Parameters:
        c - takes a single character as its only argument of whole numbers and one of operator from +,-,* and if The input is 'C' then it will clear the calculator inputs.
        Returns:
        return a Calculator object as a result of processing the input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - will throw an IllegalArgumentException for any invalid inputs.

      • getResult

        public java.lang.String getResult()
        Description copied from interface: Calculator
        A functionality to returns the current result of the calculator. The result at any point should show either what was entered thus far, or the result.
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface Calculator
        Returns:
        returns the current result as a String.
